  • Method Details

    • getModifier

      Modifier getModifier()
      Get the modifier attached to this value.
      Returns:
      the Modifier object or null if none exists.

    • getType

      Class<T> getType()
      Get the Java type class of this value.
      Returns:
      the Class of the type.

    • getValue

      T getValue()
      Get the actual value.
      Returns:
      the value.

    • setValue

      void setValue(Object instance, T value)
      Set the value and apply it to the instance's field.
      Parameters:
      instance - The object instance.
      value - The new value.

    • getField

      Field getField()
      Get the field this value is bound to.
      Returns:
      the field.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Get the display name of the value (either from the Modifier or the field name).
      Returns:
      the name.

    • getID

      String getID()
      Get the ID of the value (typically the field name).
      Returns:
      the ID.

    • load

      void load(Object instance, org.simpleyaml.configuration.file.YamlFile yamlFile, String path)
      Load the value from a YamlFile and set it to the object instance.
      Parameters:
      instance - The object instance to apply the value to.
      yamlFile - The YamlFile to load from.
      path - The base path for this value.
